title: Water Quality Engr
description: Reclamation of water and wastewater for potable and industrial uses, groundwater remediation. Principles of physical, chemical, and biological treatment processes.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 2300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (CEE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 3340 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
